qualifications.title: Architectural Design Firm
qualifications.description: The Architectural Design Firm certification is issued to companies operating in the Architectural field by Development Bureau, HKSAR Government.

qualifications.title: Building Materials Supplier Certification
qualifications.description: The Building Materials Supplier Certification certification is issued to companies operating in the Building field by Hong Kong Construction Association.

qualifications.title: Green Building Design Certification
qualifications.description: The Green Building Design Certification certification is issued to companies operating in the Green field by Hong Kong Institution of Engineers.

qualifications.title: Safety Management Certification
qualifications.description: The Safety Management Certification certification is issued to companies operating in the Safety field by Development Bureau, HKSAR Government.

qualifications.title: General Building Contractor
qualifications.description: The General Building Contractor certification is issued to companies operating in the General field by Hong Kong Construction Association.
